title: NotRestoredReasonsSchema
description: Reasons why the document was blocked from using the back/forward cache

children.description: Array of NotRestoredReasons objects for child iframes

id.description: ID attribute value of the iframe

name.description: Name attribute value of the iframe

reasons.description: Array of reasons why the page was blocked from using bfcache

reason.description: The reason why the page was blocked

url.description: URL of the navigated page or iframe
